name: Rootin' Tootin' (Tiley)
description:
*GAME LAGS IN CERTAIN BROWSERS - TRY FIREFOX OR DOWNLOAD THE .EXE IF YOU EXPERIENCE LAG*

You are a cowboy in an underground Ranch, and you're tired of drinking 'Roots' branded root beer all day. Journey to the surface to find something else to drink, but watch out for the hazards along the way...

Post your best time in the comments! (Mine is 0:57)
Thanks for playing :D
